title: Conduct Succession Planning for a Key Role
description: An HR business partner is facilitating a succession planning meeting for a 'Director of Engineering' role.

tasks.description: Identify the key role and its required competencies from the company's job architecture.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP retrieves the profile for the Director role.

tasks.description: Identify high-potential internal employees who could be potential successors.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP identifies 2-3 potential internal candidates based on performance data.

tasks.description: Document the readiness level and development gaps for each potential successor in the succession planning tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP facilitates a discussion with leadership and documents the outcomes in the system.
